answers.text: Using the AWS console you decrypt your private key to get the password.
You use a root account password which is emailed directly to you by AWS.
Using the AWS console you decrypt your public key to get the password.
You use a root account password that is given to you at the end of the AMI configuration.

text: You have just launched an EC2 instance running Windows and are trying to access it. How do you get the local administrator password?
